description:
Intelligent Investment Assistant

HXSmart is the first intelligent investment assistant launched by Hithink Royalflush in the field of machine learning and artificial intelligence. With big data and powerful natural language processing technology, HXSmart aims to provide stockholders with stock selection, stock diagnosis, intelligent Q&A and other services. The more you communicate with HXSmart, the more it understands your preferences and habits, and the more efficiently it can help you solve problems.
